% Auto-generated from JSON schema

\begin{entitytable}{Identification Method}
\textbf{\field{averageConfidence}} & number (≥0, ≤100) & Average confidence score achieved by this method \\
\textbf{\field{implementationCost}} & enum(4 values) & Relative cost of implementing this method \\
\textbf{\field{locationSuitability}} & array<string> & Locations where this method can be effectively used \\
\textbf{\field{methodId}} & string (pattern) & Unique identifier for the identification method \\
\textbf{\field{methodType}} & enum(7 values) & Type of identification method \\
\textbf{\field{regulatoryAcceptance}} & array<string> & Regulatory frameworks that accept this method \\
\textbf{\field{scalabilityFactor}} & enum(4 values) & Scale at which this method can be effectively applied \\
\textbf{\field{technologyReadinessLevel}} & integer & Technology Readiness Level (TRL 1-9) of this method \\
\field{equipmentRequired} & array<string> & Equipment needed to implement this method \\
\field{lastUpdated} & string (date-time) & Timestamp of the most recent data update \\
\end{entitytable}
